mapper.select: SELECT A.photo_uciCode as uciCode, M.compName AS copyright, SUM(price) as price FROM basket A INNER JOIN photo B ON A.photo_uciCode = B.uciCode INNER JOIN member M ON B.member_seq = M.seq WHERE A.member_seq = #{member_seq} GROUP BY A.photo_uciCode
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM basket WHERE member_seq = #{member_seq} AND photo_uciCode = #{uciCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basket (price, regDate, member_seq, usageList_seq, photo_uciCode) VALUES (#{price}, NOW(), #{member_seq}, #{usageList_seq}, #{uciCode})
